H0.text: Bryan Ferry was the lead singer of which 1970’s band. T. Rex

H1.text: Bryan Ferry was the lead singer of which 1970’s band. David Bowie and the Spiders from Mars

H2.text: Bryan Ferry was the lead singer of which 1970’s band. The New York Dolls

H3.text: Bryan Ferry was the lead singer of which 1970’s band. Roxy Music

A4.text: Roxy Music were an English rock band formed in 1970 by Bryan Ferry (lead vocals/keyboards/principal songwriter) and Graham Simpson (bass).
